mapper.insert: insert into PENSION_OLDMANINFO_B (ID, NAME, SEX, HASRELIGION, RELIGION, PCARDID, CULTURE, REGISTERADDRESS, RESIDENTADDRESS, LIVINGSTATUS, ECONOMICSFROM, MEDICALPAYTYPE, MARITALSTATUS, BIRTH, SOCIALCARDID, FAMOUSFAMILY, CONTACTPERSON, CONTACTTEL, PHOTOURL, RECENTRATING, CREATETIME, MODIFYTIME,EVALUATIONCOUNT,NURSINGHOMEID) values (#{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{sex,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{hasreligion,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{religion,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{pcardid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{culture,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{registeraddress,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{residentaddress,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{livingstatus,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{economicsfrom,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{medicalpaytype,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{maritalstatus,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{birth,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{socialcardid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{famousfamily,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{contactperson,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{contacttel,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{photourl,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{recentrating,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createtime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{modifytime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{evaluationcount,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{nursinghomeid,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
mapper.update: update PENSION_OLDMANINFO_B set NAME = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SEX = #{sex,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, HASRELIGION = #{hasreligion,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, RELIGION = #{religion,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PCARDID = #{pcardid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CULTURE = #{culture,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, REGISTERADDRESS = #{registeraddress,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, RESIDENTADDRESS = #{residentaddress,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, LIVINGSTATUS = #{livingstatus,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ECONOMICSFROM = #{economicsfrom,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, MEDICALPAYTYPE = #{medicalpaytype,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, MARITALSTATUS = #{maritalstatus,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, BIRTH = #{birth,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SOCIALCARDID = #{socialcardid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, FAMOUSFAMILY = #{famousfamily,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CONTACTPERSON = #{contactperson,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CONTACTTEL = #{contacttel,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PHOTOURL = #{photourl,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, RECENTRATING = #{recentrating,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CREATETIME = #{createtime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, MODIFYTIME = #{modifytime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, EVALUATIONCOUNT = #{evaluationcount,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, NURSINGHOMEID = #{nursinghomeid,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where ID = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: select ID, NAME, SEX, HASRELIGION, RELIGION, PCARDID, CULTURE, REGISTERADDRESS, RESIDENTADDRESS, LIVINGSTATUS, ECONOMICSFROM, MEDICALPAYTYPE, MARITALSTATUS, BIRTH, SOCIALCARDID, FAMOUSFAMILY, CONTACTPERSON, CONTACTTEL, PHOTOURL, RECENTRATING, CREATETIME, MODIFYTIME,EVALUATIONCOUNT,NURSINGHOMEID from PENSION_OLDMANINFO_B where ID = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

select ID, NAME, SEX, HASRELIGION, RELIGION, PCARDID, CULTURE, REGISTERADDRESS, RESIDENTADDRESS, LIVINGSTATUS, ECONOMICSFROM, MEDICALPAYTYPE, MARITALSTATUS, BIRTH, SOCIALCARDID, FAMOUSFAMILY, CONTACTPERSON, CONTACTTEL, PHOTOURL, RECENTRATING, CREATETIME, MODIFYTIME,EVALUATIONCOUNT,NURSINGHOMEID from PENSION_OLDMANINFO_B WHERE 1=1 ${_parameter}
select a.*,b.name as ylyname from PENSION_OLDMANINFO_B a left join PENSION_OLDMANHOME_B b on a.NURSINGHOMEID=b.id where 1=1 ${_parameter} order by a.modifytime desc
